gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Statistically downscaled GCM data using Bias Corrected Constructed Analogs (BCCA)

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Santa Clara U., Climate Central, U.S. Bureau of Reclamation, Scripps Institution of Oceanography, U.S. Dept. of Energy

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This archive contains fine spatial-resolution translations of 53 contemporary climate projections over the contiguous United States. The original projections are from the World Climate Research Programme's (WCRP's) Coupled Model Intercomparison Project phase 3 (CMIP3) multi-model dataset, which was referenced in the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change Fourth Assessment Report.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Santa Clara U., Climate Central, U.S. Bureau of Reclamation, Scripps Institution of Oceanography, U.S. Dept. of Energy

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This URL provides a standard THREDDS catalog containing the OPeNDAP resources summarized in this metadata record.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: This record was translated from NcML using UnidataDD2MI.xsl Version 2.3. It was subsequently edited for representation on the Geo Data Portal for dblodgett@usgs.gov.
